import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Grid, Image, List, Divider, Segment, Url, Header, Rating, Button, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' const _SearchMovieListDisplay = (props) => { const [height, setHeight] = useState(window.innerWidth); useEffect(() =>{ const setHeightofScreen = () => setHeight(window.innerHeight) window.addEventListener('resize', setHeightofScreen) return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', setHeightofScreen) } }) return (

{props.movie.original_title || props.movie.name}
{props.movie.overview} Rating: {props.movie.vote_average * 10}%{" "} ) } export default _SearchMovieListDisplay;
